column2: The topics ''point_class", "line_class", and "vector_class" got renamed to "line", "point", and "vector" in the publisher "vector_map_loader" but not the subscribers "feat_proj", "lane_rule", and "velocity_set"
column3: There is no topic with only subscribers that has the same type as a topic with only publishers
column16: Was on a feature branch (did not merge into master before the fix)
column18: Potentially also change of topic type

column2: Node "lattice_trajectory_gen" is subscribing to unused topic "odom_pose"
column16: bug was present for about 2 months

column2: Node "velocity_set" is subscribing to topic "base_waypoint" instead of "base_waypoints" (published by "lane_select") since it was renamed
topic name was changed to "/detection/object_tracker/objects" in config file
The msg type of "ConfigWaypointLoader" changed from "autoware_msgs" to "autoware_config_msgs". The change was missed in my_mission_planning.launch
column18: “cloud_cluster_class” does not exist in that version but existed before and was renamed in commit

column2: Topic name domains changed from "lane_navi" to "lane_rule"
The temporaryt topic name "image_obj_tracked_" changed to "image_obj_tracked"
Topic "current_pose" is unused (has no publisher). But obj_reproj still subscribes to it
The waypoint_clicker was subscribing to topic clicked_point instead of initialpose
column13: need to create one for waypoint_clicker

column2: There was a typo in the parameter "publish_objects" for component lidar_fake_perception
The parameters "image_node" and "points_node" were not forwarded to "cv_tracker"
The remap from the scan topic for the laserscanner node was incorrect

The topic "imu_filtered/data" was incorrectly referenced as "imu/data"  in a yaml file
The topic imu/data_compass was renamed to imu/data
Renames topic narrow_scan to scan o connect to amcl
A launch file references a non-existing file /config/teleop.yaml
The launch of imuGpsEstimator remapped /gps_imu/pose to /pose_estimate_new instead of /pose_estimate
autorally_plant subscribed to magic constand "/pose_estimate" instead of the topic name from the parameter
The topics camera/left and camera/right were not remapped correctly to left_camera and right_camera
The topic image was not remapped correctly to (arg side)_camera/image_diagnostic
A typo in mppi controller launch files set the parameter path_topic to /mppi_opponent_controller/... instead of /mppi_controller/...
Constant paths to /home/gwilliams76/catkin_ws/ need to be replaced
